column2: Commissioner may  remit  it  to  such  employee.  Where  the  employee  when  served  with

column1: such  notice  pays  such  amount  or  such  balance  directly  to  such  employees  instead  of

column2: transmitting it  to  the  Commissioner as  required by  such notice,  he  shall be  deemed not
to  have paid amount or such balance to such employee.
